name: Нефритовый щит (4)
note:
<loop animation: 15, state3, 1>

<Custom React Effect>
if (value > 0) {
check = value - Math.round($gameActors.actor(2).def*1.5);
if (check < 0) { 
value = 0;
} else {
value -= Math.round($gameActors.actor(2).def*1.5);
}
AudioManager.playSe({ name: "M_shield_damage", pan: 0, pitch: 100, volume: 90 });
target.removeState(89);
target.addState(90);
target.gainHp(Math.round($gameActors.actor(2).mhp*0.2));
}
</Custom React Effect>

name: Пламенный лотос
note:
<loop animation: 21, state2, 1>

<Custom React Effect>
target.startAnimation(26);
user.gainHp(Math.round($gameActors.actor(2).mhp*0.1));
</Custom React Effect>

<Custom Action Start Effect>
if (user.isStateAffected(8)) {
  user.startAnimation(22);
  const dmg = Math.round($gameActors.actor(2).mdf * 5);
  user.gainHp(-dmg);
  user.customPopup(dmg, 5); // 5 = "обычный" урон
}
</Custom Action Start Effect>

<Custom Remove Effect>
target.startAnimation(26);
</Custom Remove Effect>
